name: epigraphically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to words that are written on or cut into a hard material such as clay or stone, or to the study of these: There are epigraphically documented links between these sites. The city has been studied epigraphically and archaeologically. Related words
epigraphic
epigraphical
More examplesFewer examplesThe details of the epigraphically reconstructed history of the site are still being studied.Our understanding of political organization in the area still needs to be investigated epigraphically and archaeologically.These events have all been described epigraphically.Most of these writers are known only epigraphically, as none of their works survive.
